page.title: 10Rural Recreation
page.content: Pastimes are many, the ladies of the community preferring craft work -{ {knitting, sewing and painting,}the more energetic playing{badminton}- a game of skill played with rackets and shuttlecocks. Outdoor activities for both men and women included{gardening}in all forms, {keeping hens}and selling the eggs at the farm gate provided interest for one farmers wife. A more unusual hobby was that of{keeping and racing {pidgeons,}the birds being transported great distances, released and the first bird home is the winner. { Showing sheep and cattle}at country shows occupies a lot of time, with continual grooming being a time consumer.
